alert.note: Alert for Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 25 at 3:22AM PST until December 26 at 10:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM PST SUNDAY ABOVE 5000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Plan on difficult travel conditions. Tree branches could fall as well. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches, with localized amounts up to 12 inches, are expected. * WHERE...San Bernardino and Riverside County Mountains above 5000 feet. * WHEN...6 PM today to 10 AM Sunday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Be prepared for significant reductions in visibility at times. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For road condition information in California...enter 8 0 0 4 2 7 7 6 2 3 if inside california or 9 1 6 4 5 5 7 6 2 3 if outside California.

area.areaDesc: Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains
